checkpointRace.dialogue: Hi newbie im Leelo, and I will be your race engineer.
And my name is Oleel, I will ...
Ignore my twin he talks alot, welcome to planet Grunkes newbie, you'll be racing for us, team Kled.
Before I was rudely interupted, I was gonna tell you that I'll be managing and part of your pit crew.
Today your going to be racing in a checkpoint race, just you and the track seems easy enough right?
I wouldnt say that, our previous driver couldn't make it halfway through the race before we knew we needed to find a new driver.
Dont scare him Oleel! If you stick to the rules you'll be fine.
The main thing is to finish the race before the timer hits zero.
Checkpoints are marked on the track each time you enter a checkpoint time will be added to your overall time.
Make sure you avoid the boundry otherwise it will slow you down.

beginnerRace.dialogue: Hi newbie im Leelo, and I will be your race engineer.
And my name is Oleel, I will ...
Ignore my twin he talks alot, welcome to planet Grunkes newbie, you'll be racing for us, team Kled.
Before I was rudely interupted, I was gonna tell you that I'll be managing and part of your pit crew.
Today you'll be racing in a beginner race against other drivers.
The track is simple. Just make sure you finish in the top 3, and try to bring back my ship in one piece.
We would hate to get rid of you after one race
We'll see you on the track.

advancedRace.dialogue: Hi newbie im Leelo, and I will be your race engineer.
And my name is Oleel, I will ...
Ignore my twin he talks alot, welcome to planet Grunkes newbie, you'll be racing for us, team Kled.
Before I was rudely interupted, I was gonna tell you that I'll be managing and part of your pit crew.
Today your going into an advanced race against other drivers.
This track is going to require a bit more stratergy. The track has multiple routes it's up to you to decide which one to take. Just make sure you make it in the top 3.
Drive safe, our last driver came back in multiple pieces on this course.
Just remember we dont have medical aid goodluck newbie.
